description:
As a user
I want to search for a featured product on Automation Test Store
So that I can add it to the cart and verify it is included
name: Automation Test Store Shopping Cart Test

elements.name: Add "Benefit Bella Bamba" to the cart

steps.name: I visit the Automation Test Store homepage
I search for the featured product "Benefit Bella Bamba"

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 10000ms: Expected to find element: `.productcart`, but never found it.
    at AutomationTestStorePage.selectProduct (cypress/page_objects/automationTestStorePage.js:11:11)
    at Context.eval (cypress/e2e/step_definitions/automationTestStoreSteps.js:15:28)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/resolveStepDefinition.js:193:0)
    at Context.eval (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js:27:0)

steps.name: I add the product to the cart
the product "Benefit Bella Bamba" should be in the cart
